name: Dokapon?! Millennium Quest
overview: One day, Dokapong's 18th king, Dokat Ypa Tshusha de Pong, was troubled by a certain incident and put out a job advertisement throughout the kingdom. A paradise awaits you with three meals and a nap! The ad brought an adventurer to the kingdom of Dokapon. Will you be able to complete the king's job and become a full-fledged adventurer? 151 monsters await you, from the dim-witted to the infuriating! 150 weapons and shields to choose from! You can synthesize them into stronger equipment at the blacksmith in town. There are also "phantom equipment" that can only be synthesized... The battle is based on the "rock-paper-scissors" system, so it is important to outwit your enemies. Get into a heated battle with your friends and steal their equipment too!
